Aurora.Framework.IChatPlugin Interface Reference

Adds functionality so that modules can be developed to be triggered by chat said inworld by avatars. More...

Properties

string Name [get]
 Returns the plugin name.

Detailed Description

Adds functionality so that modules can be developed to be triggered by chat said inworld by avatars.
